landing.title: Discover Unique Experiences
landing.subtitle: Your platform for booking exclusive properties and experiences
landing.featuredPropertiesDesc: Discover our best properties selected for you.
landing.featuredExperiencesDesc: Live unforgettable moments with our selected experiences.
landing.featuredGreenFeesDesc: Exclusive access to the best golf courses in the region with special rates and unique conditions

filters.title: Filters
filters.pricePerDayDescription: Choose the daily price you would pay for medium stays (15 days minimum, 60 days maximum)
filters.pricePerMonthDescription: Choose the maximum monthly price for long stays (60 days minimum, 9 months maximum)
filters.seasonDescription: Mark the seasons that interest you
filters.propertyTypeDescription: Mark to choose the property type

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We answer all your questions about bookings and accommodations

howToBook.question: How can I book a property?
howToBook.answer: It's very easy. Simply search for your destination, select your check-in and check-out dates, choose the number of guests and complete the booking process with your payment details.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely.

cancelBooking.question: Can I cancel my booking?
cancelBooking.answer: Yes, you can cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the arrival date. Specific cancellation policies vary by property. Check the terms of each accommodation.

verifiedProperties.question: Are the properties verified?
verifiedProperties.answer: All our properties go through a rigorous verification process. This includes quality inspection, photo verification and amenities validation to ensure your satisfaction.

priceIncludes.question: What does the booking price include?
priceIncludes.answer: The price includes complete accommodation, cleaning, towels and sheets. Some properties may include additional services such as WiFi, parking or pool access. Check the specific details of each property.

contactHost.question: Can I contact the host?
contactHost.answer: Yes, you can communicate directly with the host through our integrated messaging system. Hosts usually respond within 24 hours.

problemDuringStay.question: What happens if I have a problem during my stay?
problemDuringStay.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you with any problem. You can contact us by phone, email or live chat from the application.

travelInsurance.question: Do you offer travel insurance?
travelInsurance.answer: Yes, we offer travel insurance options that cover cancellations, medical problems and property damage. You can add it during the booking process.

faq.notFound: Can't find the answer you're looking for?
faq.noResults: No results found for your search.
faq.helpSubtitle: If your question isn’t here, our team replies quickly.
faq.helpNote: Typical reply within 24h (24/7 support for urgent issues).

hero.title: Live off season
hero.subtitle: Find off-season accommodations and plans at unbeatable prices.

search.whereToGo: Where do you want to go?

howItWorks.subtitle: Long Stays with Unique Experiences
howItWorks.description: From 15 days to 11 months in off-season vacation destinations

reservationModal.title: Reservation types
reservationModal.intro: All bookings are formalized through a medium-stay contract, with a minimum duration of 15 days and a maximum of 11 months.

short.title: Short stay (15–60 days)
short.body: The full stay is paid at the time of booking.

monthly.title: Monthly stay (2–11 months)
monthly.body: It is paid month by month throughout the stay.

accommodations.title: Accommodations in idyllic off-season locations
accommodations.description: We find selected houses, apartments and villas in unique vacation destinations, available from September to July, at unbeatable prices

experiences.title: Immersive experiences
experiences.description: We have long-stay experiences like golf lessons, or Kitesurf or Green fees with monthly off-season rates at unbeatable prices, or short-stay ones like seeing great monuments like the Alhambra, the Mosque of Córdoba, or discovering the White Villages, or going for pintxos in Donosti or touring Toledo by Balloon, or visiting spectacular wineries.

flexibility.title: Flexibility and community
flexibility.description: Combine destinations, meet other travelers in our social network with similar interests and participate in exclusive local activities.

explore.title: Explore and choose your destination
explore.description: Filter by location, duration and type of experience or accommodation on our website or app.

reserve.title: Easy and secure booking
reserve.description: Select dates, accommodation and experiences. Digital contract and secure initial payment.

enjoy.title: Enjoy your stay and activities
enjoy.description: When you arrive, your accommodation will be ready, a calendar of experiences and support throughout your stay, so you don't have to worry about anything.
